about_the_game:
This game is a 2D action game in which high school students fight.
You can advance to the next level by punching and kicking enemies to destroy them all.

You can strengthen your character with money obtained from the enemies.
Eating food in the shop will power up the main character.
You can also learn new skills in the shop.

You can pick up trash cans, bamboo spears, and other fallen weapons and use them.
You can also use punches and kicks to send trash cans and soccer balls flying and hit enemies.
You can also chase enemies by launching them into the air to deal more damage.

You can control the game with the keyboard or with the XBOX360 controller.
Simply jump, punch, kick and move.
Press enter (start) to save the game from the menu screen.

You can change the language on the title screen.
